Zapping, mp1e and rte released New release of your favourite programs, some of the improvements are:
Zapping 0.6.1
Added Swedish translation.
Reported to build and work (using XVideo) under FreeBSD and Solaris.
Automatic overlaying of subtitle TTX pages.
Reverted to the old fb depth detection routine.
Some bugfixes in the mpeg plugin, adapted to use rte 0.3.1's new controls api.
Fixed some bugs with Arabic and Hebrew TTX glyph mapping.
Usability improvements, especially in the channel editor.
Updated de, es, fr and pl translations.
mp1e 1.9.2
Some important bugs fixed.
Abort after two seconds if audio and video cannot sync.
Cleaned up --usage
rte 0.3.1
New controls api, unfinished (code using 0.3's api will still work).
Web page redesigned As you can see, the web page has been redesigned, it has new contents and support for different themes (works best with cookies enabled). Thanks a lot to Carsten Menke, he worked hard to create the excellent Carsten theme. I hope you like the new design. 0.6.0 released 0.6.0 has been released, new in this release:
Aspect ratio autodetection and fixes
Faster MPEG capture
GUI improvements
Standalone Zapzilla executable
New alirc plugin
Man pages
Added Polish translation, updated de, es, fr
Much more, see the ChangeLog.
You can download Zapping from here.
